sourcesContent:
PANTALLA

Sale Value

$ {{saleValue}}

import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild, ElementRef } from '@angular/core'; import { ShowingModel } from '../models/showing.model'; import { ShowingService } from '../services/showing.service'; import { ChairService } from '../services/chair.service'; import { ChairModel } from '../models/chair.model'; import { TicketService } from '../services/ticket.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sale', templateUrl: './sale.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sale.component.css'] }) export class SaleComponent implements OnInit { showings!: ShowingModel[]; selectedItem!: Number; rows= Array.from({length: 10}, (_, index) => index + 1); columns: String[] = ["A","B","C"]; saleValue: number = 0; chairsList:ChairModel[] = []; disableChairs!:ChairModel[]; constructor(private showingService : ShowingService, private chairService: ChairService, private ticketService: TicketService){} ngOnInit(): void { //this.FullColumns(); try{ this.showingService.getShowings().subscribe(data=>{ this.showings = data; }); }catch(e){ console.log("error: "+ e); } } public onChange(){ console.log("ID Selected: "+this.selectedItem); this.chairService.getOccupiedChairsByShow(this.selectedItem).subscribe(data=>{ this.disableChairs=data; this.chairsColors(); }); } private FullColumns(){ let start = 'A'; // letra de inicio let end = 'F'; // letra final for (let i = start.charCodeAt(0); i <= end.charCodeAt(0); i++) { this.columns.push(String.fromCharCode(i)); } } onClick(event: any) { console.log("El botón presionado es: " + event.target.id); let idB = this.getIdsRowColumn(event.target.id); const button = document.getElementById(event.target.id); if (button) { if(button.style.backgroundColor == 'green'){ button.style.backgroundColor = 'lightgrey'; }else{ button.style.backgroundColor = 'green'; let row = parseInt(idB[0]); console.log("column tranform: "+ idB[1]); this.chairService.getChairByRowColumn(row,idB[1]).subscribe(data=>{ console.log(data.toString()); this.chairsList.push(data); console.log("length chairs: "+ this.chairsList.length); this.chairService.getPriceByLever(data.levelID).subscribe(p=>{ this.saleValue+=p; }); }); } } } public sell(){ } private getIdsRowColumn(id:String): string[]{ let splitIds: string[] = []; if(id.length==3){ let num = id.charAt(0)+id.charAt(1); let row = id.charAt(2); splitIds.push(num); splitIds.push(row); }else{ let num = id.charAt(0); let row = id.charAt(1); splitIds.push(num); splitIds.push(row); } return splitIds } private chairsColors(){ console.log("length disable chairs: "+ this.disableChairs.length); this.disableChairs.forEach((item) => { let idBtn = item.number+""+item.row; let button = document.getElementById(idBtn) as HTMLButtonElement; if (button) { console.log("button is true idBtn: "+idBtn); button.style.backgroundColor = 'red'; button.disabled = true; } }); } }
